6. #### [City Council](https://www.trentonnj.org/259/City-Council)

   The Trenton City Council is the legislative branch of the Trenton City government.
7. View the City of Trenton election results.
8. Get access to the approved ordinances for the City of Trenton.
9. Take a look at the City of Trenton resolutions.
10. View current and historical tax rates for the City.
11. #### [Ward Map (PDF)](https://www.trentonnj.org/DocumentCenter/View/440/Official-Ward-and-Election-District-Map-PDF)

    Check out the City of Trenton Ward Map.
